text:
Hi folks,
I need some advice on how to develop a quite not-as-usual survey and form.
We´re trying to do an online survey (you answer some questions splitted in differente pages, and get your results in the last one, basically like a Typeform, but we´d love to do it in HubSpot CMS).
What we need to figure out is the right way to do this without any third-party app (what´s the best kind of CMS module for this) and get the results automated into a follow-up email that prospects can receive after finishing the test.
We´re trying to develop it using css and javascript, basically, but I got the feeling that there´s some another and easy way.
Any advice would be highly appreciated.
Thanks in advance
There's a multi step form in the asset marketplace. Have you checked that one out?
nope! but I will right now. thanks <@U011G9G4U49>
can´t find it.. can you point me to it with an url or it´s name, please?

Hello all from NYC! Running into an issue creating a blog post using a custom post template. When creating a post everything works normally except bullets. When you hit the bullet button no bullet is placed and copy-pasting bulleted lists removes the bullets. Has anyone had this problem before?
Do you have a link to a preview of one of the posts? This sounds like it could be a CSS issue where your `list-style` is set to `none`.
Thanks! this could be it, I hadn't set a style but it could be that by default will check it out
